my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) Smoking is not permitted on deck; b) Consult 'Hot Work' Risk Assessment, if necessary;

The relevant publications i.e. 'Grain Code', 'International Maritime Solid Bulk Cargoes (IMSBC) Code', 'International Maritime Dangerous Goods (IMDG) Code' and 'Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS)' should be consulted for information on safe stowage, cargo handling, safety precautions, etc.
The stability book and relevant manuals should be consulted for information on tank top / hatch cover / tween deck load.
a) Use suitable and appropriate PPE: high-visibility vests, etc.; b) Adequate lighting to be provided. Use portable lighting if necessary.
Communication must be established, via VHF or signals, between the vessel and crane operator / foreman.
